name: Clean Codex
description: A cleaner, better looking style for the Wordpress Codex (codex.wordpress.org)
additional_info:
v2.0 27 Jan 2016
  • A refresh for the new year! I've made slight polishes to v1.0 and fixed some bugs.
  • As always, please send me your feedback »3
v1.0 24 Dec 2014
  • First major release, just in time for the 2014 holiday season!
  • The Codex pages are way more friendly to the eyes of those who have to spend so much time reading Wordpress documentation.
  • Work will continue and more updates in 2015! Please send me your feedback / bug reports, and let me know if you have ideas for further improvement. Thanks! :)
v0.1 08 Nov 2014
  • initial (beta) release
  • increases page font size to make everything more easily readable
  • improves display of the page's Table of Contents
  • provides more spacing between headings so breaks are visually more distinct
  • other misc enhancements. enjoy! :)
